item.title: 220 Short video (10 second long) production for TikTok - Upwork
item.description:
**Job Title: Promotional Video Creator**

**Description:**
Seeking a creative individual to craft 220 humorous, original promotional videos for a new challenge platform. These videos should illustrate how effortless it is to earn cash by completing simple challenges and sharing proof on TikTok. All videos must be in English, at least 10 seconds long, self-recorded, and entirely original. AI-generated content is not permitted.

**Responsibilities:**
- Create 220 brief, comedic videos.
- Demonstrate yourself successfully completing challenges.
- Participate in straightforward tasks (e.g., bottle flipping, push-ups).
- Establish a dedicated TikTok account for posting these videos.

**Deliverables:**
- 220 high-quality, engaging videos.
- Each video must be at least 10 seconds long.

**Key Features to Emphasize:**
1. Simplicity: Show how easy it is to join and participate.
2. Speed: Quick to complete and upload.
3. Rewards: Highlight the potential to earn by completing challenges.
4. Fun: Emphasize the entertaining and competitive aspects.
5. Authentic Wins: Show real examples of winning.
6. Emotional Impact: Each video should evoke an emotional response from viewers.

**Benefits:**
- Opportunity for future projects.
- $30 bonus for any video that surpasses 700,000 views on TikTok.
- A stable monthly salary of $2,500 if 10 videos reach over 700,000 views.

**Budget:**
$200

**Deadline:**
55 calendar days

Apply now to help our platform go viral and gain future opportunities!

Budget: $200
Posted On: July 01, 2024 10:11 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production
Country: Georgia
click to apply

item.title: Easy Video Record for Youtube (Female only) - Upwork
item.description:
Hello! We are a fast growing Youtube channel that focuses on doing ASMR videos. Currently we are in search of female YouTube content creator to join our team. The ideal candidate should be good-looking, confident in front of the camera. This is a simple job of recording a video while blow drying your hair, we'll give you further instructions.

   Requirements:
    - High quality camera / phone that can shoot in 4K
    - Рepresentative, neat environment / cozy ambience.
    - Follow guidelines and is detail-oriented.
    - Can give unique ideas for content and help to grow the channel.
    - Ability to attract viewers
    - Confident showing face on youtube. (without talking)
    - Has hair dryer & vacuum cleaner available at home, preferrably new model ones. (it will be needed for our videos).
    

The job is simple and fit for beginners, you don't need to be a professional. The most important for us is to work with confident and good-looking people. The payments will be per video recordings. (There will be a Bonus Payment, if you are good)
Further this can turn into a long-term opportunity for you. Please attach a picture of yourself or previous content. (Very Important)

Applicants without photos attached won't be checked!!!



    

Budget: $10
Posted On: July 01, 2024 10:06 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:YouTube Video, Video Editing, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Graphic Design, Beauty & Health Photography, Beauty, Instagram
Skills: YouTube Video, Video Editing, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Graphic Design, Beauty & Health Photography, Beauty, Instagram
Country: Bulgaria
click to apply

item.title: I am looking to create a few video (2-5) for Facebook Advertisement - Upwork
item.description:
I am looking to create 5 Videos for my Facebook advertisement video. I have the concept of the video and perhaps I already have the footage, picture & short video to allow you "the Editor" to combine them and create a suitable one for my Video concept.
15-20 Secs Max for the whole video.
More like a shop overview Video, From the external view into the internal View of the shop.
My current business are groceries shop.
I am only looking for someone who are serious and could complete the task as soon as possible, perhaps i would prefer someone who can communicate well, and I am also looking for a much longer term hiring although this is just the first project.
For those who is interested please included "I can easily provide you 5 videos with your concept" when you apply for the job, people who does not include will be automatically ignored.

item.title: Assistance in transcribing short videos, like TikTok - Upwork
item.description:
Assist me in transcribing existing SoMe channels, such as TikTok etc.

Hello!

I need you to immediately join our team for transcription services. You would be asked to view existing SoMe channels and their videos online.

You are asked to accurately note

* The URL of the SoMe video
* Duration of video
* Amount of views
* Transcribe the English language videos, including roles, if there are multiple speakers

Your output would be to Google Doc. Something like:

ROLE A: "At this moment in time, the exchange rate of gold has gone down, and we are looking into the abyss regarding any technical progress. Caution all!"

ROLE B: "Yes, Stephan, I agree with you - however, let's look into the prices of copper and gold today"


BUDGET: For every one minute of live video transcribed and approved, you will receive 4 minutes pay.  So, for every approved hour billed to us, you must have accurately transcribed 15 minutes of live video.  

We are looking for an immediate start, and can provide about 10 hours weekly to start with.

Looking forward to hearing from you

Hourly Range: $4.00-$8.00
Posted On: July 01, 2024 09:39 UTC
Category: Manual Transcription
Skills:Video Transcription, English, General Transcription, Writing, Data Entry
Skills: Video Transcription, English, General Transcription, Writing, Data Entry
Country: Denmark
click to apply

item.title: Social Media Manager - Upwork
item.description:
Introduction


We are looking for motivated in the field of Social Media & Content Creation to support us in designing and maintaining the social media presence of our tattoo studios in Munich. Would you like to work in a creative environment, be supported, develop yourself further and put your ideas into practice? Then apply now and become part of our constantly growing team!


Tasks

Content development for various channels, primarily Instagram
Creation, editing and post-production of image & video material
Planning and creating content for our social media channels
Implementation and further development of our content strategy
Profile

Social media and content marketing is your second home and you know how to create content for the respective target group on different channels
Knowledge of image editing and video editing
You are studying social media & media communication or a comparable degree program
Good knowledge of digital image editing and video creation programs (Premiere, After Effects, etc.)
Portfolio of creative work in the field of social media
You are interested in online marketing and enjoy working with different marketing channels
Creativity, sense of aesthetics, initiative, ability to work in a team and receptive to feedback


We offer

Development opportunities in the implementation of new ideas
Ownership and autonomy over your own area
Opportunities for growth and advancement
Improved work-life balance thanks to flexible working hours

Please send your application documents including portfolio


Hourly Range: $17.00-$25.00
Posted On: July 01, 2024 09:44 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Social Media Marketing Strategy, Social Media Management, Social Media Marketing, Social Media Content Creation, Facebook, Instagram, Social Media Content
Skills: Social Media Marketing Strategy, Social Media Management, Social Media Marketing, Social Media Content Creation, Facebook, Instagram, Social Media Content
Country: Bangladesh
click to apply

item.title: Website Navigation Tutorial - Upwork
item.description:
We are a dynamic and innovative media company seeking to enhance our online user experience.

We are looking for a talented Video Producer to create a high-quality tutorial video demonstrating how to navigate our website for the use of our members.


We are seeking a skilled and creative Video Producer to create an engaging and informative tutorial video that guides users through the navigation of our website. The ideal candidate will have experience in video production, a keen eye for detail, and the ability to simplify complex instructions into clear, concise, and visually appealing content.

Responsibilities:

Film and produce a high-quality video that showcases key features and functionalities of the website.

Ensure the video is clear, engaging, and easy to follow for users of all technical levels.

Edit the video to include graphics, animations, voice-over, and other necessary elements to enhance the tutorial.

Collaborate with our team to ensure the video aligns with our brand guidelines and objectives.

Deliver the final video in a timely manner.

Budget: $50
Posted On: July 01, 2024 09:35 UTC
Category: Web Design
Skills:Information Architecture, Website, WordPress, Video Commercial, Tutorial, Video Ad
Skills: Information Architecture, Website, WordPress, Video Commercial, Tutorial, Video Ad
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: Professional Videographer and Photographer for Italian Restaurant in Doha - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a highly skilled and creative videographer and photographer to capture the essence and ambiance of our Italian restaurant in Doha.
Our goal is to produce exceptional quality visuals that highlight our exquisite meals, unique atmosphere, and overall dining experience.
We want these images and videos to be eye-catching, inviting, and reflective of our brand's high standards.

Responsibilities:
- Capture high-quality photographs of our restaurant’s interior, exterior, food, and drinks.
- Produce engaging videos showcasing our dishes, kitchen operations, and dining experience.
- Edit photos and videos to ensure top-notch quality and consistency with our brand image.
- Collaborate with our marketing team to ensure the visuals align with our promotional strategies.
- Deliver final edited versions of photos and videos in multiple formats suitable for web, social media, and print.

Requirements:
- Proven experience in restaurant or food photography and videography.
- A strong portfolio showcasing your previous work in similar projects.
- Ability to work on-site in Doha.
- Professional-grade equipment for both photography and videography.
- Excellent editing skills and proficiency with editing software (e.g., Adobe Photoshop, Lightroom, Premiere Pro, etc.).
- Strong attention to detail and a creative eye for capturing the best shots.
- Good communication skills and the ability to work - collaboratively with our team.

Deliverables:
- 50-100 edited high-resolution photographs.
- 20 short promotional videos (30 seconds to 1 minute each).
- All raw footage and photos.

Budget:
Please provide a detailed breakdown of your pricing, including:
- Day rate for shooting.
- Editing costs.
- Any additional expenses.
- Estimated total cost for the project.

Timeline:
- Project start date: immediately
- Shooting dates: during 2 days max
- Final deliverables: after 4 days of the shooting max

How to Apply:
If you meet the above requirements and are excited about this opportunity, please submit your proposal including:
- A brief introduction about yourself and your experience.
- Links to your portfolio and previous relevant work.
- A detailed quote based on the deliverables mentioned above.
- Your availability for the project dates.
- Any additional information you think is relevant.

We look forward to working with a talented professional who can help us showcase the best of our restaurant through stunning visuals!


Posted On: July 01, 2024 09:30 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Photography, Videography, Video Editing, Photo Editing
Skills: Photography, Videography, Video Editing, Photo Editing
Country: Turkey
click to apply

- Final deliverables: after 4 days of the shooting max

How to Apply:
If you meet the above requirements and are excited about this opportunity, please submit your proposal including:
- A brief introduction about yourself and your experience.
- Links to your portfolio and previous relevant work.
- A detailed quote based on the deliverables mentioned above.
- Your availability for the project dates.
- Any additional information you think is relevant.

We look forward to working with a talented professional who can help us showcase the best of our restaurant through stunning visuals!

item.title: YouTube Shorts Content Creator - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a creative and talented individual to help promote our app, PicWish, on YouTube Shorts. PicWish is available on the App Store, and we need engaging 10-30 second videos that highlight the app's features and benefits.

Requirements:
Create short, engaging videos (10-30 seconds) for YouTube Shorts.
Use provided sample videos as inspiration and guidelines.
Showcase the PicWish app’s key features, benefits, and user interface in a captivating manner.

About PicWish:
PicWish is a powerful app designed to make photo editing simple and accessible for everyone. It offers a variety of features to enhance and transform your photos with just a few taps. Check it out on the App Store!

item.title: Luxury Story-Telling Reel Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
Hey, good people of Upwork, this post is to get an experienced editor, who knows how to edit restaurant and lounge reels.

I shoot in SLOG 3 with Sony A7S3 and you must be good at color grading to match the mood and tone of the brand.

This project is 20 - 30 second reels but it's not about the length its more about your storytelling in your editing.  The nuances etc.

The restaurant is like a lounge so Jazz is preferred.

Anyway, you must be efficient at receiving Google drives full of video clips and chopping them up to make vibe reels.

I will upload a folder of the inspiration.

Just confirm and shree with me your past work so we can move forward.

This project will be the beginning because I will do an official shoot next week. this was their soft launch.

so here is the inspo video's let me know if you can create in the world,
Check Floder Below.

https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1-PMkUsbF-t1JaGeYiqxDDFVC3T9Mh47R?usp=sharing

item.title: Videographer and Editor Needed - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled videographer and editor to shoot and edit videos for our company. The ideal candidate should have experience in both filming and post-production. This is a freelance position that requires the ability to work independently and meet deadlines. The videographer and editor will be responsible for capturing high-quality footage, organizing and editing clips, adding graphics and effects, and producing final videos that align with our brand guidelines. Attention to detail and creativity are essential.    

Skills required:
- Videography
- Video editing
- Cinematography
- Adobe Premiere Pro
- Final Cut Pro
- Graphic design
